tier.item: (11) a. Maria (go) spotkala (go) w srode.
M.- N O M him met him on Wednesday - AC C
The authors refer to these as "partial VP-fronting"; actually, they rather involve full VP-
fronting (maybe except for the clitic raising in (9-a)). However, truly partial VP-fronting is
also possible in Czech (see below for examples).
This example stems from Adam Przepiórkowski's "Toy Corpus", an early predecessor of the
IPI PAN corpus, which has been disconnected recently.
VP-Fronting in Czech and Polish Corpora 93
`Mary met him on Wednesday.'

city L. by-the-way rather boring S B J - 3 S G us here

good if-S B J - AU X - 1 P L adjust could to foreign country

good here,) if we could adjust to the foreign country." '
